app_descript:
App Name: SAP Concur

Brief: SAP Concur is a travel and expense management mobile app designed for on-the-go professionals and existing users of SAP Concur solutions. The app streamlines various aspects of business travel, from booking transportation and accommodation to tracking mileage and managing itineraries. It integrates seamlessly with TripIt to provide real-time alerts and updates, ensuring a smooth experience for busy travelers.
